showerReviews.reviewText: If you don‚Äôt have pilots points rewards why this shop works like a pilot, I was trying to get a shower but paying when we bought a lot of diesel with them, they said its impossible get a shower, only if I pay, really? With more than 5 showers in rewards

By far, one of the best Pilot/ONE 9  in the network. Management and staff are a great team in keeping the facility clean and store stocked. Showers and parking limited, plan ahead. My go to when heading south.

The employees are so nice and so so helpful for what even your need is. The place is super clean like the cleanest truck stop I have ever showered in. Julie and Matt definitely deserve a raise. Thank you all so much for everything
Super small here keep going driver to the next exit the big J there, clean got no def
1 diesel pump work on 5-6. Only 12-15 parking spots. I stopped there because Google mentioned a truck wash but there is none. There is NO room in that location for it

showerReviews.reviewText: I think it's really stupid to leave $5 in cash for a shower. The ATM was broken, and I couldn't do it because of stupid policies (I could have left my watch or something else while I showered).

‚Ä¶ in picking fights than actually helping. It‚Äôs like they‚Äôre covering up their own miserable lives by taking it out on those of us just trying to get fuel, a shower, or a place to rest. It‚Äôs unacceptable and downright disrespectful. ‚Ä¶

Originally walked in everything was cool some dude showed me the shower it was clean but then I went out to purchase a shower the attendant told me I had to put the deposit in cash so I have to go out and get cash or else pay $6 to take out ‚Ä¶
Zero human compassion, drove 30 mins to get here. Dont take tap to pay an want a $5 deposit on a 15 dollar shower. Lady had an attitude. Im a southern gentleman who shows EVERYONE RESPECT. TERRIBLE

Good place to park,shower, and food. They have  a Grillers restaurant in truck stop good Puerto Rican food.
A small peaceful stop with the amenities needed. The staff was helpful and friendly and we enjoyed our stay here even though parking and the shower was quite expensive.

Super! Paid parking, laundry, shower. Ran into a small problem with my laundry and the owner took care of it immediately. Hard to find a nice truck stop in Orlando. I‚Äôve used mudflap with them before too. Once I‚Äôm ready to leave I‚Äôll fill ‚Ä¶

Nice friendly staff, clean store and restrooms.  Didn't get to shower here tho. Maybe next time. I will definitely be back!
